#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main(){
    long int tc;
    long long int m,n,pro;
    cin>>tc;

    while(tc--){
        cin>>m>>n;
        if(m==1 && n==1)
            cout<<"0/1\n";
        else if(m%2 && n%2){
            pro = m*n;
            cout<<pro/2<<"/"<<pro<<endl;
        }
        else
            cout<<"1/2\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
